name: SlimeBuster Demo
description:
SlimeBuster Demo

The objective of the game is to survive each round of invading slimes after which a more difficult round begins. The player begins the game with no cash. As players fight the slimes, they receive cash and perks.

**IMPORTANT NOTE**

  • This game is still in Beta and nothing is final. There's more to come e.g Environments, Weapons, Perks.
  • The Demo Version is only available for testing and promotion purposes.    

Controls: (Windows Build)

W A S DMoveRReloadMouse 0Shoot
E or Mouse 1Switch Weapons
